<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <record_update table="v_plugin"> <v_plugin action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>active</active> <available_version>1.0.0</available_version> <definition><![CDATA[<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <plugin id="com.snc.certification_core" name="Certification Core" version="1.0.0" provider_name="ServiceNow" state="published" type="application" help="Certification" cache_flush="true" afterload="fix_cert_filters.js" licensable="true">
<description>Core certification structures such as filters, templates</description>
<requires> <import plugin="com.glide.list_v2"/> <import plugin="com.snc.version" /> </requires> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="CertificationProcessing" class="com.snc.certification_core.CertificationProcessing" /> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="ConditionUtils" class="com.snc.certification_core.conditions.ConditionUtils" /> <extension point="com.glide.ui.jelly" name="com.snc.cert_attr_cond_display" class="com.snc.certification_core.conditions.jelly.CertAttrCondDisplayTag" /> <extension point="com.glide.ui.jelly" name="com.snc.cert_rel_cond_display" class="com.snc.certification_core.conditions.jelly.CertRelCondDisplayTag" /> </plugin> ]]></definition> <description>Core certification structures such as filters, templates</description> <has_demo_data>false</has_demo_data> <help>http://docs.servicenow.com/?context=Certification</help> <id>com.snc.certification_core</id> <licensable>true</licensable> <name>Certification Core</name> <path>plugin://com.snc.certification_core/</path> <provider>ServiceNow</provider> <requires>com.glide.list_v2,com.snc.version</requires> <scope>global</scope> <state>published</state> <supports_rollback>false</supports_rollback> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2017-12-05 06:05:22</sys_created_on> <sys_id>com.snc.certification_core</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2017-12-05 06:05:22</sys_updated_on> <trackable>true</trackable> <type>application</type> <version>1.0.0</version> </v_plugin> </record_update>
